title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: When the change editor menu is open and I press F1, some help is displayed. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing me from reading its contents. If F1 is intended to provide help for the change editor menu, the help window should stay open for the user to read.
EB: When the change editor menu is open, and I press F1, the help window should stay open, allowing me to read its contents. It should not close immediately.
SR:
1. Open the change editor menu.
2. Press the F1 key.
